title: math expr with pos value - determine preconditions

content.question: Which of the following preconditions for the method is most appropriate to ensure that the value printed by the code segment is always greater than zero?

choices.label: /** * Preconditions: x is greater than zero. * y is not equal to zero. */
/** * Preconditions: x is not equal to zero. * y is greater than zero. */
/** * Preconditions: x is even and is not equal to zero. * y is not equal to zero. */
/** * Preconditions: x is not equal to zero. * y is even and is not equal to zero. */

content.answer: /** * Preconditions: x is not equal to zero. * y is greater than zero. */

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
